Name: Crux
Instructions: Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The 'crux' of the matter is rarely as tasty as this fruity and none-too-sweet brandy-laced cocktail.
History: Until I revisited the Crux on 23rd February 2023, our recipe followed the original equal parts proportions with: 30ml (1oz) Cognac 30ml (1oz) Triple sec 30ml (1oz) Dubonnet Red 30ml (1oz) Lemon juice
Nutrition: One serving of Crux contains 155 calories
